messages.title: I just couldn't stay with the Conservative Party.
messages.content: Its relentless determination to push ahead with Brexit, no matter what the cost, has divided the country and put so much at risk. Urgent problems - like climate change, widening inequality, the lack of affordable housing and our overstretched NHS - have been neglected.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will reinvent the relationship between business and the communities in which they operate, so that they are a part of the solution to our biggest challenges, not the problem.

issues.brexitEurope: The prospect of No Deal Brexit has already put our economy in reverse, making it even harder for so many in our country.
issues.economy: The prospect of No Deal Brexit has already put our economy in reverse.
issues.environment: Urgent problems like climate change have been neglected.
issues.health: Our overstretched NHS has been neglected.

housing.content: The lack of affordable housing has been neglected.

leaflet.personalStatement: Earlier this year, I left the Conservative Party because it had shifted beyond recognition.

quotes.text: If Remainers come together, we can combat the hatred and division at the extremes of the Conservative and Labour parties.

leaflet.additionalNotes: At the General Election this December I urge you to vote Liberal Democrat. P.S. If Remainers come together, we can combat the hatred and division at the extremes of the Conservative and Labour parties. We can build a brighter future.
